name: GUNFIRE
description:
Created for the 2018 Gun Jam Game Jam.

Drag guns into the fireplace and burn them (click off a gun to light your pointer).

Collect the materials from burnt guns and use them to craft and sell items for money, with which to buy more guns to burn!

Guns and Pieces have physics, throw em around!

If there is no fire in the browser version turn on hardware acceleration and make sure WebGL is on, or  give the download a go.

Twitter: @GamesOnVideo

Music: 

"Industrial Cinematic"
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
